casebody.data:
Richard J. FREER
v.
YIGUANG FU et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 14, 2017

Andrew Chien, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Richard J. Freer, self-represented, in opposition.

The petition by the defendant Andrew Chien for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40304) is denied.

MULLINS and KAHN, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
